column5: Vacation on the canal! Relax and enjoy the beautiful view of the water from the third floor balcony. This 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo has one queen bed and a two futons to comfortably sleep 6 guests. It's the perfect place for a beach trip with the family or vacation from the city. Washer and dryer are inside the unit; cable provided. The complex has both a pool and hot tub to enjoy in the warm South Texas Sun.
column8: PORT ROYAL FORTUNA BAY, #302 1 BD 1 BTH WATERFRONT
